ygData.authorName: Reece Tom CPT25 ID L G4(n)
ygData.subject: Fabian quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been out of the loop for past few weeks and haven t kept up to speed on any recent game changes that affect bards (newborn babies will do that to you).
ygData.messageBody:
I've been out of the loop for past few weeks and haven't kept up to speed on
any recent game changes that affect bards (newborn babies will do that to
you). Was wondering if the Fabian quest been "fixed" yet? I heard that now
you get some special coin. Has anyone figured out what to do with the coin
yet? Or is the final verdict that this is just another lame quest with
little to no reward?

Any other game changes that affect bards since early July?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
